detail_desc: Puff pants in soft organic cotton jersey.

prod_name: PELLE Basic S/S jersey polo SB
detail_desc: Polo shirt in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed collar and button placket.
Short sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs.
Wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Cropped top in cotton jersey with overlocked edges at the top and hem and narrow, ribbed shoulder straps.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Boots with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front and loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and chunky soles. Heel 3.5 cm.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with worn details in a relaxed fit with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and tapered legs.

Pyjamas with a ribbed, long-sleeved top and patterned bottoms in soft organic cotton jersey. Top with a V-neck and wrapover top for easier nursing access. Bottoms with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist.
Blouse in a soft cotton weave with an elasticated neckline and raglan cap sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey. Round neckline with a narrow, ribbed trim, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Maxi dress in patterned viscose chiffon with frills, a V-neck with ties at the top, long sleeves, and smocking at the waist and cuffs. Partly lined.
Calf-length airy chiffon dress in a narrow cut at the top with short, tie-top shoulder straps, deep armholes that wrap over lower down and an elasticated seam at the waist. Lined.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a yoke at the back and a rounded hem.
Short dress in a soft, fine knit with a round neckline and long sleeves.
Double-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, buttons at the front and jetted front pockets. Lined.
Large grained imitation leather purse with a zip around the top, twelve card slots and a zipped coin compartment. Lined. Size 2x10x19.5 cm.
Cap in a cotton weave with elastication at the back.
KAROLINA KIJAK x H&M. T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a rib-trimmed neckline. Press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Blouse in airy patterned chiffon with a collar and concealed buttons down the front. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and an asymmetric hem. The blouse is made partly from recycled polyester.
Short, wide T-shirt in printed jersey.
Straight-cut top in soft cotton jersey with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.
Underwired bra in lace with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back, and a wide lace trim at the hem.
Fabric cap with elastication at the back.
Flared skirt in a double layer of tulle with lots of volume. Elasticated waist. Lined.
Jumper in a textured, premium cotton knit with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit jumper in a soft viscose blend with long sleeves and a lace trim at the cuffs and hem.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front, narrow shoulder straps and a racer back.
Wide, slightly shorter jumper knitted in a mohair blend with a deep V neck, low dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves that taper to the cuffs. Ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.

Relaxed-fit joggers in stretch cotton twill with a lightly brushed finish. Elasticated drawstring waist, a fake fly, side pockets and jetted back pockets. Slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with ribbing at the hems.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and medium coverage at the back.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high waist and concealed zip in one side. Fake diagonal front pockets with decorative buttons, welt back pockets and wide, straight legs with creases.
Non-wired lace bra with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Blouse in a plumeti viscose weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a seam and flounce at the hem.
Long, sleeveless dress in a crisp, patterned cotton weave with a V-neck and shoulder straps. Gathered seam at the waist, a concealed zip in the side and a skirt with tiers to the hem. Unlined.
Cropped, boxy-style top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Round neckline, dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves with close-fitting, ribbed cuffs and a cut-off hem.
Boys' briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined crotch.
Short cardigan in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a V-neck and large buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Round-necked blouse in a softly draping weave with concealed fasteners at the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with a slit and button at the cuffs.
Socks in a rib-knit wool blend with elasticated tops.

Long dress in a patterned Tencel™ lyocell and viscose weave with a deep V-neck, a V-shaped panel at the waist with a piped trim, and a concealed zip in one side. Long puff sleeves with gathered, vertical seams at the top for added volume, a seam at the elbows and close-fitting cuffs. Unlined.

Washed cotton twill joggers in a relaxed style with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, welt back pockets, and slightly lower crotch. Tapered legs with decorative seams at the knees and elasticated hems. Regular fit.
Running shorts in fast-drying, stretch jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ventilating mesh sections at the top and crotch. Mesh inner shorts.
Gloves knitted in soft chenille yarn with a faux fur trim at the top.
Dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, wrapover front with a concealed fastening, and a concealed zip in one side. Long puff sleeves, cuffs with covered buttons, and a flounced, two-tiered skirt.
Straight-cut jacket in faux fur with a collar, concealed press-studs down the front, dropped shoulders and side pockets. Lined.
Shaping briefs in jersey with a high waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back. The briefs have a firm sculpting effect on the waist.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a bow tie or tie. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Joggers in soft denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, an open back pocket and tapered legs.

Biker jacket in supple suede with a diagonal zip down the front and notch lapels with press-studs. Chest pocket and side pockets with a zip, an open inner pocket, and a zip at the cuffs. Viscose lining.

Jeggings in superstretch denim with a low waist, zip fly and button, and back pockets. The cotton content of the jeggings is partly recycled. Push up – denim with a superstretch function that showcases the body’s physique.
Pyjama T-shirt and shorts in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt with a print motif on the front and shorts with an elasticated waist.

Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with contrasting colour stripes down the sides, an elasticated drawstring waist and slightly lower crotch. Side pockets, one back pocket and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Linings in a cotton weave and insoles in imitation leather. Heel 8 cm.
Blouse in woven fabric with a deep V-neck and 3/4-length sleeves with scalloped trims at the cuffs. Lined.
Hairband in elasticated velour with an appliqué on top.
5-pocket jeans in sturdy denim. High waist with pleats at the top, a zip fly and button, and wide, tapered legs.
Top in organic cotton jersey with short cap sleeves.
Smartphone case in plastic. Fits iPhone 6/6s/7.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Relaxed-fit blouse in a crinkled weave with a small stand-up collar and buttons down the front. Long, wide sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Sports gilet in padded nylon. Hood with an elastic drawstring and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Chest pocket and side pockets, all with a concealed zip, and covered elastication around the armholes. The gilet has a THERMOLITE® T-Down EcoMade filling, which is down-like insulation that is lightweight yet provides superior warmth and breathability. The filling is made entirely from recycled PET fibre.
A pair of earrings in metal decorated with sparkly glass stones and pearly plastic beads. Together the earrings spell the word LOVE. Length 4 cm.
Shorts in an airy cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets with a press-stud.

Cropped sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details, long sleeves, and wide ribbing at the hem. The top is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
5-pocket skinny-fit trousers in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and shaping seams at the knees.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Tunic in an airy, patterned weave with an opening at the top and small frilled collar with ties at the front. Yoke at the back, a seam under the bust and 3/4-length sleeves with a frill trim. Unlined.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.

V-neck jumper in fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
